modules.name: Authentication Core
modules.description: Handles user authentication, session management, and security protocols.
modules.content:
Overview

The Authentication Core module is the central hub for all user-related security operations. It provides robust and secure methods for user sign-up, login, and session handling. It's built on top of industry-standard protocols to ensure data integrity and user privacy.

Key Features

  • Secure password hashing using bcrypt.
  • JWT-based session management.
  • Role-based access control (RBAC).
  • OAuth 2.0 integration for third-party logins.

Implementation is straightforward, requiring only a few lines of code to protect your application's endpoints.

changes.description: Patched a minor vulnerability in password reset flow.

modules.name: UI Component Kit
modules.description: A comprehensive library of reusable React components.
modules.content:
Component Library

The UI Component Kit is a collection of pre-built, customizable, and accessible React components designed to accelerate front-end development. All components are styled with Tailwind CSS and are fully responsive.

Available Components

  • Buttons and Inputs
  • Modals and Dialogs
  • Data Tables with sorting and filtering
  • Responsive Navigation Bars

Each component comes with detailed documentation and examples to ensure easy integration into your project.

changes.description: Released new Data Grid component with virtualization.
Improved accessibility for all form components.
Fixed a z-index issue with the Modal.

modules.name: Database Connector
modules.description: A powerful ORM for seamless database interactions.
modules.content:
ORM Abstraction

The Database Connector provides a type-safe and intuitive API for interacting with your SQL database. It abstracts away the complexities of raw SQL queries, allowing you to work with JavaScript objects and methods.

Supported Databases

  • PostgreSQL
  • MySQL
  • SQLite

Features include automatic migrations, connection pooling, and transaction support to ensure your data layer is both robust and performant.

changes.description: Added experimental support for NoSQL databases.
Query performance improved by 15% through caching.

modules.name: Test3
modules.content:
Kesimpulan

  1. Firebase Studio prototyping memang tidak bisa diandalkan 100% untuk testing DOM root manipulation.
  2. Kode Anda sudah jauh lebih rapi dan tidak akan error di lingkungan normal.
  3. Untuk benar-benar bebas error di semua konteks (sandboxed iframe, SSR), perlu penyesuaian di akses DOM dan classList.
  4. Evaluasi juga penggunaan setTheme("light theme-zinc") vs format eksplisit untuk jangka panjang.


Kalau butuh versi refactor yang lebih modular dan fleksibel, saya bisa bantu buatkan fungsi setTheme({ base, variant }) lengkap.


Saat return ini:

CopyEdit

const theme = variant && variant !== 'default' ? `${baseTheme} theme-${variant}` : baseTheme;

Anda mengembalikan string seperti "light theme-zinc".

Kalau konsumennya (komponen lain) memakai ini sebagai className langsung, maka bisa error lagi di classList.add(...).

Jika theme hanya untuk display atau logging, aman. Tapi jika akan dipakai sebagai string class CSS (misalnya di <div className={theme}>), maka harus dipastikan tidak mengandung spasi kecuali di-split.
